name: WTHIStormTeam10
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WTHI News 10 is your leading provider of weather in the Wabash Valley, Western Indiana and Eastern Illinois.

Never let the weather catch you by surprise again. The trusted weather experts at Storm Team 10 deliver Terre Haute, Indiana's most accurate hour-by-hour forecast for the next day and for the week ahead. Unlike other weather apps, you'll get a local forecast that is customized for you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
